page.title: 03New Wolvey -Employment
page.content: We asked a selection of villagers about the 'New' Wolvey people. "They've come from Coventry and Nuneaton to live here but they don't work here. Their{EMPLOYMENT}is in the towns outside Wolvey because there's mainly farming around here.In fact there's a good many in the past who went from{FARMING}to work in the car factories in Coventry and at{ROLLS {ROYCE}in Ansty." "There are 3 garages in the village only 1 of which sells petrol.There is a Post Office, an Off Licence and a General Stores which used to be the Co-op about 20 years ago.Apart from the school and the 2 Public Houses there is not much more employment in the village."
